rindex
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Compatability with mlfilms package

Retrieve a material's refractive index from the database

Retrieve a material's refractive index from the database

rindex.get(pageid)

Arguments

pageid

The material pageid from rindex.search

Value

returns a dataframe with the wavelength (in meters) dependent n and k values

Examples


rindex.get(0)
#> Material: Ag
#> Source: Rakic
#>       wavelength          n          k
